<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:VirtualDirectories" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>1</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[SubAdminFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Sub Admin Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 <DisableOwnerCheck>false</DisableOwnerCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 <DisableOwnerCheck>false</DisableOwnerCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>

 <ServerId>2</ServerId>

 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>

 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 <DisableOwnerCheck>false</DisableOwnerCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 <DisableOwnerCheck>false</DisableOwnerCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>3</ServerId>

 <VirtualDirectoryName>User Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>

</ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.VirtualFileSystem.VirtualDirectorySecurity[],TCAdmin.SDK" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2020-02-29 09:27:21" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:V1_GAME_ID" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="by jungle (GNZServers)
thanks to un-named source for customscript" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:FileManager" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditPatterns>
 <string>*.cfg</string>
 <string>*.txt</string>
 <string>*.ini</string>
 </EditPatterns>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
 <DefaultFileName>custom.cfg</DefaultFileName>
 <WriteBom>false</WriteBom>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2021-10-14 09:27:51" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:STEAM_API_GAME_VERSION" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:STEAM_API_GAME_VERSION_UPDATE" value="2022-03-23 03:48:23" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_config_files.template:
### Dedicated server settings ### To use your own dedicated.yaml (e.g., "MyDedicatedConfig.yaml"), add "-dedicated MyDedicatedConfig.yaml" to the corresponding batch file
ServerConfig: Srv_Port: $[Service.GamePort] Srv_Name: $[HostName] Srv_Password: $[PrivatePassword] Srv_MaxPlayers: $[Service.Slots]
# Idle playfield servers held in reserve. For busy public servers, we recommend at least 2 (default = 1) # Valid range: 0..10 # Srv_ReservePlayfields: 1
### Server description shown in Server Browser ### max 127 chars: "-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------" # Srv_Description: "Server info, can contain [b]bold[/b] text or a [u][url=empyriongame.com]link[/url][/u]."
### Set the following parameter to false (or comment the line out) if you want to hide your server in the Server Browser ### If server is not visible you can connect via IP or via joining a friend's game. Srv_Public: true
### All playfield servers will be automatically stopped every <n> real time hours. Players will get some warning messages before # Srv_StopPeriod: 48
### Activate Telnet server # Tel_Enabled: true # Tel_Port: 30004 # Tel_Pwd: Abc
### Activate Easy Anti Cheat (clients have to enable EAC via Options -> Misc to connect to a EAC protected server) EACActive: true
### Location of save game folder SaveDirectory: Saves
### Restrict allowed Blueprint size class: restricted types are not allowed to be produced or spawned # 1 = allow only small blueprints, ... , 10 = allow very large blueprints, ..., 50 = allow gigantic blueprints, ... , 0 = no limits ### Warning: large blueprints can have very strong performance impact! MaxAllowedSizeClass: 10
### Restrict Blueprint types allowed for production in factory ### None = Blueprint system completely disabled ### StockOnly = only stock blueprints can be produced ### All = all types allowed (default) AllowedBlueprints: All
### Timeout in seconds after which a playfield server process will be killed (and all players on it disconnected) if it does no longer send heartbeat messages to the dedi ### Set 0 to disable this feature HeartbeatServer: 15
### Timeout in seconds after which a client will be disconnected if it does no longer send heartbeat messages to the dedi ### Set 0 to disable this feature # HeartbeatClient: 30
### Enable extra log outputs (for debugging purposes) ### Defined flags: (add together the values if more than one group should be active at the same time) ### 1 = EAC ### 2 = EAC_all_details (includes EAC - Note: this generates a lot of log lines) LogFlags: 1
### Uncomment the following line if you want to prohibit Steam Family Sharers playing (only the game owner can then play) # DisableSteamFamilySharing: True
### Players with a ping higher than the value specified below will be locked out of the game. We recommend to not allow too high pings as this can result in player cheating KickPlayerWithPing: 300
### Monitors booting playfield server processes, kills them if they time out (time in seconds, 0 = disabled) ### Note: This is a conservative default, for faster servers 60 seconds should be ok TimeoutBootingPfServer: 90
GameConfig: GameName: DediGame # Determines name of the save game Mode: Survival # Survival or Creative Seed: 1011345 # The seed determines how the world is procedurally generated - the same seed means the same world CustomScenario: Default Multiplayer # Enable custom scenario. Name of custom scenario from folder Content\Scenarios
tc_game_config_files.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2020-02-29 09:27:21" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:Encoding" value="0" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2021-10-14 02:06:50" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_config_files.template:
--- # Admin Configuration
# ========================================================= # === PLEASE RENAME TO adminconfig.yaml TO BE EFFECTIVE === # =========================================================
# This file can contain two lists: one with elevated players with special permissions # and one with banned players.
# 'Id' is a SteamID64 in both lists, lookup possible at https://steamid.io/ # 'Permission' is 3 for 'GameMaster', 6 for 'Moderator' and 9 for 'Admin' - other values are not allowed. # 'Until' is the time when the ban ends.
Elevated: - Id: 00000000000000000 # put the correct SteamID64 here Permission: 3 # make this user a GameMaster, for example - Id: 11111111111111111 Permission: 6
tc_game_config_files.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:Encoding" value="0" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2020-03-01 06:26:03" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2020-03-01 06:26:19" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_config_files.template: Options: - ValidFor: - SP - Survival DecayTime: 0 ProtectTime: 0 ProtectDelay: 0 MaxStructures: 255 AntiGriefDistancePvE: 0 AntiGriefDistancePvP: 0 AntiGriefOresDistance: 0 EnableTrading: Player2System EnableMaxBlockCount: false GroundedStructureSpawn: false - ValidFor: - MP - Survival WipeTime: 720 ProtectTime: 24 ProtectDelay: 1800 MaxStructures: 500 AutoMinerDepletion: false TurretUndergroundCheck: true DespawnEscapePod: true RegeneratePOIs: true
